overview_of_class: Methods and concepts of linear and nonlinear optimization theory, going beyond the treatment of optimization in calculus. Topics not usually covered in real analysis, including Kuhn-Tucker Theory, convexity conditions, and linear programming. Fulfills a prerequisite for the Kellogg managerial analytics certificate. Prerequisites: 285-3, 290-3, or 291-3; or both 240 and 300.
name: Introduction to Optimization
title: WCAS MATH 368-0-31 Introduction to Optimization
